trans-unit.source: Represents a custom label for an axis.

CustomLabel objects are stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabelsCollection> class, which is exposed as the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.CustomLabels%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> class.
Axis labels for the first label row are automatically generated unless custom labels are specified using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.CustomLabels%2A> property.
If you specify a custom label along the first label row, no axis labels will be automatically generated for the entire first row.
Only custom labels may be used for the second label row.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel.ToPosition%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel.FromPosition%2A> properties determine the axis range that the label applies to.

A grid line and/or tick mark can be displayed for a custom axis label by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel.GridTicks%2A> property; this property specifies whether a custom grid line or tick mark will be drawn in the middle of the label range.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel"></xref> class.
This constructor can be used to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel> class.
However, it is recommended that you use one of the `Add` methods in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabelsCollection> class to add custom labels.
Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified fromPosition, toPosition, text, labelRow, and markStyle parameters.
The beginning of the axis range the label applies to.
The end of the axis range the label applies to.
The label text.
The label row index.
The label mark style.
Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified fromPosition, toPosition, text, labelRow, markStyle and gridTick parameters.
The beginning of the axis range the label applies to.
The end of the axis range the label applies to.
The label text.
The label row index.
The label mark style.
The custom grid line and/or tick marks flag.
Gets the axis that this <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel"></xref> object belongs to.
Use this method to determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel> object belongs to.
An <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the axis that this custom label belongs to.
Returns a cloned label object.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel"></xref> object that represents a copy of the current custom label.
Gets or sets the text color of the custom label.
The ForeColor property determines the text color for a custom label.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the text color of a custom label.
Gets or sets the beginning position, in axis coordinates, of the custom label.
The FromPosition property determines the start position of the axis range the label is applied to.
The difference between the values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel.ToPosition%2A> and FromPosition properties determines where the label text will be displayed.
For example, suppose the X-axis has a scale that ranges from 1 to 5 (1, 2 ,3 , 4, 5).

In order to display a custom label just underneath the second point, you would set the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel.ToPosition%2A> property to 1.5 and the FromPosition property to 2.5.

If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.XValueType%2A>—or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.YValueType%2A>, depending on the axis in question—is set to a <xref:System.DateTime> value, then this FromPosition property will be displayed as a <xref:System.DateTime> value in the designer.
This property should not be set to the same value as the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel.ToPosition%2A> property.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the beginning of the axis range that the label is applied to.
Gets or sets a property that specifies whether custom tick marks and grid lines will be drawn in the center of the label.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GridTickTypes"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets or sets the custom label image.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the custom label image.
Gets or sets a string that represents the area attributes of a custom label image.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the area attributes of a custom label's image map.
Gets or sets the postback value that can be processed on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref> event.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the value that is passed to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref> event.
Gets or sets a color that will be replaced with a transparent color when a custom label image is drawn.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value which is replaced with a transparent color when you draw the image.
The default value is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Magenta*>.
Gets or sets the URL target of the label image.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the destination URL that is pointed to by this custom label image.
Gets or sets the label mark for a custom label.
This applies to labels in the second row only.
Label marks can only be used for the second row of labels, and are usually used to group labels together from the first row.

The major tick mark's line style of the relevant <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object is used for the line pattern of the mark, for example, the AxisX.MajorTickMark.LineDashStyle property.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelMarkStyle"></xref> enumeration value that determines the type of label mark, if any, to be used.
Gets or sets the map area attributes, if any, of the custom label.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the map area attributes, if any.
Gets or sets the marker color for the custom label.
The MarkColor property determines the color of a custom label's marker.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the marker color of a custom label.
Gets or sets the name of the custom label.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the text name of the item.
Gets or sets the postback value that can be processed on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref> event.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the value that is passed to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Click"></xref> event.
Gets or sets the index of the custom label row.
The RowIndex property specifies the index of the row label where zero is the row label closest to the axis to ten, the further most axis label.
Only custom labels can be used for the label rows beyond the first row.
If a custom label is used for the first row, labels for that entire axis will not be generated automatically; in this case, all labels for the first row must then be custom labels.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that specifies the index, 0 to 10, of the custom label row.
Gets or sets the custom label text.
The Text property gets or sets the label text of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel> object.
Note that axis labels for the first label row are generated automatically, but can be overridden using <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel> objects.
If you specify a custom label along the first axis row, no axis labels will be automatically generated for the entire first row.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the label text.
Gets or sets the custom label tooltip text.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that represents the tooltip text.
Gets or sets the end position of the custom label, in axis coordinates.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the end position of the custom label.
Gets or sets the target URL of the custom label.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the target URL of the custom label.
